title: What are some of the best feelings in life? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think some of the best feelings in life would be the following : When you are a tiny tot - When your parents bring you the first Ferrari toy car or a small toy puppy or that favourite T Shirt with a “Motorcycle” print that you can't let go off as a childWhen your parents throw a party/gathering for your 4th birthday - The 4th birthday is one you can slightly remember as an adult. It feels out of the box when so many other kids turn up and the cake looks something like below 3. When your parents buy you your favourite horse ride or your first cycle  4. When you win your first prize or award in school and keep repeating it. It feels out of the world and that everyone's looking upto you  5. When you see your first movie in a theatre - My school friend whose Dad owned a theatre, invited 30 of us to watch “Deewana Mastana” when we were 6 years old. To add on we all were given a free complimentary coke and a packet of lays with a free “Tazo". What an experience! 6. When you are the main actor in your ANNUAL DAY performance at school and you make thousands of parents and spectator cry by your performance. My first big performance was Idagah  7. When you start playing a musical instrument and perform on stage for the first time- believe me this feeling stays for lifetime whenever you play an instrument you love. You forget everything else  8. When you play a sport and score a century (Cricket), Score goals(football), win individual or team tournament for the first time - It feels like the biggest achievement. On top of it, you know that you will get that attention from the opposite sex and the 'Popular' or 'Stud' tag 9. When you eat your favourite dish in a restaurant for the first time in life. It is all the more special when your parents are strict as you know such occasions would be limited  10. When you get to sit in a train or flight for the first time and that too in a family outing. The experience is overwhelming  11. When you go on your first school trip. Subsequently every school trips feel the same making unforgettable memories 12. When you first get some pocket money and money from relatives during festivals and try to save it in a piggy bank your cute little wallet!  13. When you ace your Board exams or entrance exams and get admitted in your dream college  14. The first time when your crush who you never thought would respond to you actually speaks to you and gives you some hope :)  15. You end up in a relationship with the same person and have your first kiss!  16. When you top your class for the first time, or atleast make it in top 5 whether in a school or college and your parents feel proud of you 17. When you get your first phone and laptop - In our time, it was only once you entered college and since both phone and laptop was a privilege, it was a lovely feeling owning both the gadgets and using them. 18. When you create something in college, a company, a product, lead an event, do a great project or find your dream internship. We created the below in a team of 25  19. When you go for your first Goa trip with you best buddies  20. When your dream is to see India lift a cricket World Cup and also see Sachin become a part of World Cup winning team. Irony is you see the quarter final of the World Cup live where India defeats Australia and then goes on to win the finals in style  21. When you lose your closest friends which brings all of you a lot more closer. Losing someone is worse but realising the value of your loved ones is immense 22. What you crack your first job  23. When you get your first salary and gift your parents and relatives from that salary :) The pride in their eyes is unforgettable 24. When you start traveling for work and get used to be lonely at times. This is where you start appreciating and loving yourself. 25. The realisation when you feel you want to move on from your first job 26. When the result for the entrance exams for Masters come and you once again crack a great institute 27. Your first foreign trip.  28. All subsequent travel experiences which give you hope, broadens your vision and gives you a purpose to explore more and more  29. When your friends celebrate your birthday post 25 and shower lots of blessings and love  30. The beauty of meditating for the first time and sustaining it. Well meditation changes your life, scientifically, changes the functions and structure of your brain for good 31. Satisfaction of serving people and creating some impact in society  32. Visiting your parents and closed ones after a long time. The love and pampering you get cannot be matched 33. Reunion with friends and cousins after a long time. The feeling cannot be explained  34. Getting invited/participating in prestigious conferences across the world 35. Finding true love and companionship - One of the best feelings I would say 36. Running your own firm and scaling it or creating impact in your organisation and getting recognised for your efforts 37. Exercising regularly 38. Doing things which you love with your loved ones - even smallest of things 39. Getting inspired by your role model or your mentor and finding inspiration from surroundings. 40. Marriage 41. Having a child 42. Seeing your child crawl and then walk 43. Continuing the above cycle for your kids- the only change would be that you are now giving and your kids would be receiving. 44. Explore the world with family 45. Own a house and a car 46. The feeling you gaining some amazing perspectives by reading lots of books 47. The feeling and thrill you get when your investments multiply 48. The feeling of love when your loved ones and friends are by your side in your toughest times - crisis, disease, persons agony, professional hindrance 49. Revisiting your journey, the great times, the failures, the setbacks, the experiences, the travels, people, wildlife, spirituality and virtually everything that makes you grateful for this life. 50. Last but not the least, writing such Quora posts. Keep exploring, there are so many firsts awaiting and the best is yet to come :) Relive your beautiful memories and let go of negativities and setbacks with a beautiful smile :) In the end everything will work out
